EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners / David Jara (1343077281.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners / David Jara (1343077281.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi David, Thank you for your feedback! We do have a collateral that you can give to your client and I have included it in the link below: http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Introduction.pdf <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Introduction.pdf>. We are still working on a comprehensive list of all of our clients and I will let you know when we have that but some of our major clients are listed on the document above. Please let me know if you have any additional questions please let me know and good luck with your project search! Have a great week, Nicolette From: David Jara [mailto:davidjara@headlightdigital.com] Sent: Monday, July 23, 2012 1:08 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: MBO Partners / David Jara Hi Nicolette, Thanks for reaching out. These resources are very useful. I am in the midst of reviewing a few opportunities and should be working soon. In terms of feedback, one resource that I think might be good is how to introduce MBO to clients that currently do not have a contract with them. It is hard enough to to secure a contract personally, let alone introduce another player like MBO. For most companies, new vendors bring in lots of red tape that most are averse too without demonstrating clear value. Selling yourself, as well as MBO can be quite challenging. Another resource that we talked about is a list of companies that MBO already has relationships with. This would make it easier to target specific companies. I hope this is helpful. Regards, Dave On Fri, Jul 20, 2012 at 12:32 PM, Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com <mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com>> wrote: Hello David, I wanted to touch base as a courtesy and see how the contract search is going. We have a number of consultant resources that we continually update that you may find helpful. You may find them here: http://www.mbopartners.com/resources <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC0yOTcmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTI5NyZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzMzQ4ODg3NzMmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjQ4OTI2MDImZW1haWxpZD1kYXZpZGphcmFAaGVhZGxpZ2h0ZGlnaXRhbC5jb20mdXNlcmlkPWwtMTI4LTEyODUxLTExODI1MTYmZXh0cmE9JiYm&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/resources?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsX56uQvXKawlMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ATsBlI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D>. In addition, if you have any suggestions for new resources that might help other consultants - please let us know! Any update would be great, look forward to hearing from you. Regards,Nicolette___________________________________Nicolette TaylorEnrollment ManagerMBO Partners t: (703) 793-6281 <tel:%28703%29%20793-6281>f: 703.793.6081 <tel:703.793.6081>e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com <mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC0yOTcmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTI5NyZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzMzQ4ODg3NzMmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjQ4OTI2MDImZW1haWxpZD1kYXZpZGphcmFAaGVhZGxpZ2h0ZGlnaXRhbC5jb20mdXNlcmlkPWwtMTI4LTEyODUxLTExODI1MTYmZXh0cmE9JiYm&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsX56uQvXKawlMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ATsBlI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D> -- David JaraHeadlight Digital <http://www.headlightdigital.com/>Founder and Principal Consultant Phone: 1-312-772-5784
